articles.title: Supreme Court OKs Trumpâ€™s Mass Firings and Elimination of Federal Agencies
articles.description: The U.S. Supreme Court has lifted injunctions, allowing the Trump administration to proceed with mass layoffs and restructuring of federal agencies without congressional approval. Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson dissented, calling the decision 'unfortunate, hubristic and senseless.'

articles.title: Three Killed in New Mexico Flash Floods; Texas Flood Death Toll Rises, with 170+ Still Missing
articles.description: Unprecedented flash floods in Ruidoso, New Mexico, resulted in at least three deaths, including two children. In Texas, the death toll from recent floods has climbed to at least 109, with over 160 people still missing.

articles.title: Wall Street Rises as Tech, AI Lead the Charge
articles.description: The Nasdaq Composite led major indices, jumping nearly 1% as mega-cap tech stocks continued their upward trajectory. Nvidia briefly reached a record-setting $4 trillion market capitalization during intraday trading.
